value.latex:
On pose $u_{n,p} = \left({\frac1n \sum_{k=0}^{n-1} \Bigl(1+\frac kn\Bigr)^{1/p}}\right)^p$.
Trouver : $v_p = \lim_{n\to\infty} u_{n,p}$, $v = \lim_{p\to\infty} v_p$,
          $w_n = \lim_{p\to\infty} u_{n,p}$ et $w = \lim_{n\to\infty} w_n$.
value.html: On pose \(u_{n,p} = \left({\frac1n \sum_{k=0}^{n-1} \Bigl(1+\frac kn\Bigr)^{1/p}}\right)^p\). Trouver : \(v_p = \lim_{n\to\infty} u_{n,p}\), \(v = \lim_{p\to\infty} v_p\), \(w_n = \lim_{p\to\infty} u_{n,p}\) et \(w = \lim_{n\to\infty} w_n\).
\(v_p = \left(\frac{2^{1+1/p}-1}{1+1/p}\right)^p\), \(w_n = \exp\left({\frac1n\sum_{k=0}^{n-1}\ln\Bigl(1+\frac kn\Bigr)}\right)\), \(v=w = \frac 4e\).
